statusBarMessage.text: We are now on Open Collective! Check it out

notification.text: We are now on Open Collective! Please pitch in and support us.

notifications.title: Do you know Responsively is an open-source project?
notifications.text: Please show us your support by starring our GitHub repo.

notifications.title: Responsively App v1 upgrade is out!
notifications.text: In case you have missed, the fresh revamp of the app got released a month ago, you should upgrade now.

notifications.title: The app version you are using is a bit outdated.
notifications.text: We are revamping the app with the latest browser engine. Please download and try the beta version.

notifications.title: Do you enjoy the App?
